items.sentence: Remember to walk the dog before going to school.
Tom moved out to Los Angeles to become an actor.
Tom never talked about what happened that night.
When did you decide not to allow Tom to do that?
When do you think Tom is going to want to leave?
When was the last time Tom played golf with you?
When was the last time that you talked with Tom?
Tom didn\'t remember where he\'d parked his car.
Perhaps you could learn a thing or two from Tom.
Please inform me of any change in his condition.
Tom was accused of falling asleep on guard duty.
Tom told Mary that he was going to go to Boston.
I\'m afraid that I dislocated my right shoulder.
I\'m at a loss what to buy Tom for his birthday.
Tom took his watch off and laid it on the table.
Tom tried to explain what was happening to Mary.
Tom usually feels sleepy in the early afternoon.
Too bad Tom wasn\'t there to show us what to do.
Mary didn\'t even read the message Tom sent her.
Mary doesn\'t let her sister borrow her clothes.
